meanings.definition: The act of frequenting or visiting a place regularly.
meanings.sent1: Her frequentations at the library showed her love for books.
meanings.sent2: The frequentations of the park by the children brought joy to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: His frequentations at the ice cream shop made him the unofficial taste tester.
meanings.sent4: The frequentations of the old house by ghosts gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The frequentations of the bees in the garden made it buzz with life.

meanings.definition: The people who frequent a place or associate with someone regularly.
meanings.sent1: The frequentations of the cafe were a diverse group of regulars.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the company of her frequentations at the book club.
meanings.sent3: The frequentations of the gym always had a friendly competition going on.
meanings.sent4: The frequentations of the theater were like a close-knit family.
meanings.sent5: His frequentations at the dog park made him popular among the pet owners.
